Pequeno, mas bom. Pena que só serviu de entrada para a estrela que é o Portal 2.
Mir gefällt dieses Spiel wirklich gut, aber dass mit dem Kuchen war eine Lüge.

GraDOSがケーキケーキ言うから付いていったらうOこが出てきた件。

アクションパズルだと考えていると拍子抜けする。
ポータルガンを使ったアクションは新鮮なプレイ感覚ではあったけど
数種類の攻略パターンを延々と繰り返すだけで発展性に乏しい。
一本道のサウンドノベルだと思って世界観に浸れば楽しめる。
Bizarre Half-Life 2 spinoff, featuring Portals and... GLaDOS. 19 levels, whom the last is about the size of the previous 18 packed together. Sarcastically funny.
Sin duda uno de los mejores juegos que existen 10/10
Excelente

Eu diria que esse é o segundo melhor jogo da Valve, atrás apenas de HL2. O conceito criado aqui foi muito feliz e trouxe inovações na jurássica gama de jogos existentes.

Pra quem curte resolver puzzles (não sabe o que é isso? Google Tradutor te ajuda!), está mais do que recomendado. Uma pena que não temos algum multiplayer aqui.

E destaque para a storyline que se encontrou com a storyline de HL2 e nos deixou com um mega mindfuck por um bom tempo.

Nota 9/10

Sono negato per i giochi in stile puzzle, ma a parte un paio di situazioni ostiche le sfide sono tutte fattibli e le meccaniche originalissime lo rendono godibile anche per chi non ama il genere, come me. L'unico difetto è che è un pò breve, ma 4 euro li vale tutti!

ps. the cake is a lie! XD
Пожалуй, одна из лучших игр, в которые мне когда-нибудь посчастливилось сыграть

I love it. Though it was a bit short, I beat it in 3 hours. But I think it's just because I'm good at puzzles. A strange concept but creative and fun nonetheless. And I can't usually say that about most games nowadays. :)
Obrigatório. Comprei o Orange Pack do PS3 só para jogar esse jogo. E agora vou jogar de novo no PC.
Typisches Kultspiel. Ein Muss für alle Gamer! ;)
I love this game and everyone should love it and hug it and love it. Its short, it only took me like 3 hours to beat it but it is still amazing.
Sweet cake :) pity it's so short.

If you have not played this game you owe it to yourself as a video game fan to pick this game up.  This is possibly the best 4-6 hours of gaming you will ever do. Shere genius. Will make you laugh, feel incredibely smart and inspire you all at the same time.
Portal is a really good game with great character and an interesting twist. It is extremely short though, only about 3 hours long, so don't expect it to last you a very long time.
Really good, amazing ending :) Bit short though.
Прошёл на одном дыхании! Развивает пространственное мышление. Игра - супер!!!
Who won't like a game where you get tortured by a robot lady and get informed that cakes are lies?

Bought a Mac before Macs had game, and before I really knew PC gaming honestly. Read on Gamespot about some new-fangled "Steam" platform for gaming, that houses games from many different developers under one central community. It was coming to Mac as well. As soon as I heard that "Cake is a Lie: The Game" was free, I decided to hop on and give it a download. I quickly became obsessed, and showed it to a bunch of friends, who all joined Steam and loved Portal. In February, all 4 of us ordered Portal 2 to finally upgrade our Steam accounts. In short, had it not been for Portal, neither I nor any of my friends would ever have discovered Valve and Steam. If not for TF2 in the summer, we'd never have found the perfect game for simultaneous co-op between all of us to keep us coming back to Valve. And if not for that same summer sale, we'd never have come to know the magic of the ever-compelling Steam sales and given indie gaming a chance. It's safe to say that this game changed my life.
I LOVE THIS GAME! (^_^) BECAREFUL DON'T LET THE PUZZLES CONFUSED YOU JUST LOOK
Portal offre un concept très intéréssant, le jeux présente de l'humour et est de plus, très fun à jouer, dommage qu'il soit si court !

Portalガンと呼ばれる空間転移を行う銃と移動の慣性など駆使する3Dパズルゲーム。
パズルもとてもよくできており、Valveのレベルデザインはやはり頭ひとつ抜けてると思い知らされる。
また、キーマン(?)でもあるGLaDOSというキャラクターは皮肉に満ちたブラックジョークで場を盛り上げる。
キャラクター性、パズル共に傑作と言っていい。未プレイの人は是非プレイしよう。
なお、並のFPSより酔うと評判なのでFPS酔いに弱い人は注意すべし。

In a nutshell, you really should only buy Portal 1 for the sake of the gameplay, a few different mechanics, and harder test chambers. Get Portal 2 over this, but it's nice to have this as a set of bonus levels if you've completed Portal 2. 

Portal 1 isn't a bad game on its own, Portal 2 is a much more accessible and enjoyable experience in my opinion.
What can I say? It's Portal, one of the best games ever.  Why the hell haven't you already downloaded this?
Play it. You've played nothing like it.

What can be said about Portal? 
Is it short? Yes
Is it amazing? Yes
Is the cake a lie? Perhaps.

It is a truly excellent & revolutionary game that changed the future of gaming. It demands at least one playthrough for the game itself, and another to appreciate the dark humour that is witness throughout the entire game.

An interesting, but short and simple puzzle game with an intuitive physics system and creative characters. Portal doesn't give you a long or fulfilling experience, but it's certainly something you should look into as a basic, overly-popular game.
I like this game alot. Sure, it's short, but I would definitely get it again in a heartbeat. If you're looking to kill 4 hours and have a fun time doing so, play Portal. You won't regret it.
Great 8hr classic gameplay/wit.

The game is a fun fast pace game, and excellent for training the brain. The game is very fun and exciting! I recommend playing portal 1 before even taking a step into playing portal 2. Another cool feature is that you can download bonus maps off the internet and play them! Buy this game!
Fun if you have a brain in your head.

I often assume that everyone has played Portal by now. If you haven't, please clear your schedule for two hours and experience what is very likely one of the finest video games on any platform ever made. By turns hilarious, engrossing, and just plain fun, Portal is a first-person puzzle game that transcends every label I can think of. You will very likely be able to finish the game in one sitting, and if you paid $20 for the experience I imagine you would consider it a wonderful investment.

took 44 mins from start to finnish to complete all lvls till last one (that took another 44 mins) great humour lots of puzzles. it's cheap and it's what you pay for. story is pretty basic but if you get postal 2 it helps you "think with portals."
I'm not sure why I keep replaying this game, but there's something about it

The quintessential PC puzzle game. I've played a good amount of the game over the past few years. And while the game can clock in as long as two hours, every second is crafted beautifully. The game is at it's most fun personally when I've timed myself into how long it'll take me to run through the game and while that almost breaks some of the puzzles in the game, it still somehow feels like an entirely new experience. It's an enjoyable game even if you've played through it a few times.
Puzzles! Talking turrets! A psychotic computer!

Short, but you'd be a fool not to have this game. Challenges ARE challenging.

GET IT,

Overall: 8.5/10

What more can be said about Portal?  It was such a huge success that it started the whole Blue/Orange trend you see in so many games today.  Well, I guess that's something more that can be said.  God, I'm so stupid sometimes.
Un capolavoro della Valve. Risolvere tutti i puzzle e' una piacevole sfida. Se volete qualcosa di diverso dal solito e volete mettervi alla prova, questo titolo fa al caso vostro.
good
I got the Orange Box when it came out, and I had no idea this game was in here! But when I finished it I was litterally begging my computer screen for more!

Clevere Knobelaction. Ein "Must Have!" wenn man es günstig bekommen kann; ganz zu schweigen davon, dass es man das "UNBEDINGT" gespielt haben sollte.
Für GLADOS trifft "Geliebter Feind" voll zu.
This is a really good game a lot of fun and well its just...sooo good!!
Gran Juego
最高ＤＡＺＥ
The best FPS game where you don't get any lethal weapons but that's OK and the ending song, by itself, is better than endings in most games in totality of their content.

This quirky, short but sweet, intellectually stimulating, puzzle platforming spinoff of the Half Life series will either (a) bore you because it’s too hard (likely your own fault) (b) turn you into someone who can’t help themselves at any mention of cake or (c) turn you into someone who appreciates the game for its clever writing and simple ingenuity. Respective probabilities are 10 (the mentally challenged), 50 and 40 percent.
A puzzle game with a lot of personality. Playing with portals is a blast, and puzzle designs are really creative and fun to solve.
I only just got the game even though it came out years ago, still brilliant.

This one of the best puzzle games I have ever played. I was very skeptical at first but once I started playing this game it became one of my personal favorites. My favorite in game quote "The Cake is a Lie".
やれ。
wow. just realized i didn't recommend this. get it.
The cake is a lie.

*Gnome Seal of Approval*
Highly original puzzle based 1st person "shooter". Basically the game gives you challenges you have to overcome with just using your portal gun. With that you can place an entrance and and exit on almost any surface. This simple concept opens for some highly innovative puzzle solving.

The negative:
Not too long ago, Valve added a new achievement to the game which involves some clock radios found in certain areas. These clock radios were placed in the game when the new achievement was patched in. Why is this a bad thing? Well, these clock radios is constantly playing some silly music and this interfers with the excellent atmosphere the game originally had.
Un concept !

The most innovative FPS Puzzle game i ever played. With amazing charater portrayals and superb gameplay mechanics, this game pushes FPS games to a more creative level. Cheers to the "Narbacular Drop" team from Digipen and to Valve to realize their potential.
Valve prooves yet again that our collective concept of what a game can be is primitive at best.
a good 9 hours worth of fun, better with garry's mod.
Il miglior gioco di tutti i tempi anche se pecca in longevità!

Jogo bem curto, mas valeu os $3! Tanto valeu que joguei o demo até o fim, depois comprei (dá pra continuar de onde parou no demo) e depois joguei até terminar a história principal e mais um pouco, mais 5.4h, incluindo 3 dos mapas avançados que vem como extra (são 6). Jogo diferente, te prende porque vai evoluindo e ficando mentalmente mais desafiador, embora nada muito difícil que desanime, pelo menos na história principal. Barato vale muito a pena!

Imagine if the portal gun was real. 

I'll settle for having one in every game though.
Just about the Best game i've ever played.
portals!
Oh the things I would do if I had that gun.
A unique, one of a kind game.
I love this game. It's very funny, intence and smart!
i kinda wanted GLaDOS to be my dom, ngl
Awsome
Игра, которая совмещает жанры "Экшен" и "Логика". Маст хэв, однозначно.
Excellent and surprisingly enjoyable puzzle game.  GLaDOS is one of my all time favorite video game characters.

You don't own Portal yet? Have you been living in a cave on Mars?

It's fun, funny, and very replayable when you work for achievements or complete bonus levels and puzzles. Also check out the free "The Flash Version Mappack" for an extra 3.5 hours or so of gameplay with many creative puzzles, and hilarious remixes of the game's content.

This is a must buy.
Bon jeu, mais un peu court.
